lines.text:
[on the pyjama suicides]
Directing them is one of the most fiendishly clever minds in all Europe today. I suspect a woman.
You amaze me, Holmes. Why a woman?
Because the method, whatever it is, is particularly subtle and cruel. Feline, not canine.
Popycock. When a bloke does himself in, that's suicide.
Unless a bloke is driven to suicide; in that case it's murder.
Driven? That *sounds* like a woman, doesn't it?
Definitley - a female Moriarty. Clever. Ruthless. And above all, cautious.
I'm blessed if I know. He said wait here, by the shooting gallery, and look inconspicuous.
[Lestrade starts whistling and inspecting the ceiling]
He said inconspicuous, Lestrade, not half-witted.
Take a shot at Mussolini, Hirohito, or Hitler! Hit' en where their 'earts ought to be, and 'ear the 'ollow sound!
I'm sorry, Watson. The pleasures of the chase are no longer for me. I'm through with crime forever.
I'm so sorry we have nothing in the house for burns. I so seldom get burned.
A remarkable woman! Audacious and deadly as one of her own spiders!
